text: Ciaŋ 12.31 Wkp 19.18, Ga 5.14, Je 2.8 vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ mu nɨman abamalɨ uamalɨ. Namɨlaŋ nalusaŋ nuken mavɨn hadi hɨnihɨdalaŋ haman ala naludɨ isagalinalu imahalinalu agɨlasaŋ mavɨn hadi hɨnikalaŋ aba abamalɨ uamalɨ. Ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ akica haman agɨlaŋ nɨbɨlaŋ hadi sɨbam uamalɨ. Ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nulɨdɨ ma lɨvahala hɨnevi uamalɨ.
